entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Localization] String needs improvement #32124
  • GenAPI drops internal ctor which results in compilation errors #32119

Closed

  • Invalid parameter order when adding a project to sln using `dotnet sln add` should be validated #17686
    Backlog
  • GenAPI can generate ambiguous call to base constructor #31655

PullRequests

Created

  • Add debian to the SupportsTargetFramework logic. #32127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove reference to 'BINDING' in 'BlazorHotReload.js' #32121
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Testing updated install scripts #32112
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE

Merged

  • dotnet sln: Add error message for misplaced solution argument #18608
    Area-CLI
  • Allow opting-in to NativeAOT publishing using runtime packs #32100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32109
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the workloads txt file name to KnownWorkloadManifests.txt. #31949
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cherry-picking the Auth changes to 8.0 branch #32108
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • updated containers docs #31884
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] include container tasks and targets directly to `Microsoft.NET.Publish.Sdk` #31432
    Area-Containers
  • Enable TestBaseTypeWithAmbiguousNonDefaultConstructorsRegression31655 #32091
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Try out osx 13 to balance out the queue utilization #32102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • Try installing wasm-tool from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
